Steiner AG is a leading real estate service provider with a focus on project development. Steiner AG contributes its 100-plus years of experience to the two recently established business areas: Steiner Financial Initiatives for new investment solutions, and Steiner Digital for digital collaboration platforms serving properties' entire life cycles.

Steiner provides all of its services from a single source by highly qualified and experienced specialists. Professional and comprehensive project and risk management is the key to implementing customer needs and ideas on schedule and within budget. In order to consistently meet the most exacting requirements, the Steiner Group actively invests in training and development of junior staff and encourages know-how transfer and dialog with research and scientific bodies and public authorities.

Highly qualified and motivated employees are the key to success for the Steiner Group. We nurture a culture of exchange and dialogue, and we challenge and support our employees.

We can take the lead together – for our employees and our customers.
